pkgmetadata.longdescription: Plot and Save Customised Swiss Maps // Allows to link data to Swiss administrative divisions (municipalities, districts, cantons) and to plot and save customised maps thereof. Furthermore, the package allows to generate tailored templates for data collection. The used geodata is publicly available on the Swiss Federal Statistical Office website https://www.bfs.ad min.ch/bfs/de/home/dienstleistungen/geostat/geodaten- bundesstatistik.html.
